mapper.insert: insert into registration(store_id, storename, tel, address, lineintro, intro, image, main_menu, main_image, region_name, feature, dessert) values (#{store_id},#{storename},#{tel},#{address},#{lineintro},#{intro},#{image},#{main_menu},#{main_image},#{region_name},#{feature},#{dessert})
mapper.update: update registration set storename=#{storename}, tel=#{tel}, address=#{address}, lineintro=#{lineintro}, intro=#{intro}, image=#{image}, main_menu=#{main_menu}, main_image=#{main_image}, region_name=#{region_name}, feature=#{feature}, dessert=#{dessert} where store_id=#{store_id}
mapper.select: select * from store where id =#{param1} and pw =#{param2}
select * from store where id=#{param1} and pw=#{param2}
select * from store where ceo =#{param1} and email=#{param2}
select * from store where ceo =#{param1} and id=#{param2}
